column5: My opener flop    Barb fell a couple of weeks ago. Has had pain eversince.Yesterday the clinic took xrays and said the ankle was broken.Told her to go to the hospital today at 7.15am. 1st Spent 6 hours in the emergency ward 2nd Saw 2 specialists who checked the xrays and confirmed...no broken bones??!!!  3rd got on the water at 2 pm, and didnt see a fish.4th  Gonna try again tomorrow morning 5 AM and if you see more of these Just hit your back button and read the next post on the list.
Dont worry... Opener is over rated...

it's all good (well so to say) as my opener isn't till next weekend so you are 1 up on me.  that said, at least you know what's wrong with her foot and got it fixed so now she can kick you in the   when you come home with no fish for dinner...
Smarty pants I'm doing your opener too. I get two openers, you get one I will be in Arnprior next saturday.LMB baby !!!
All I can imagine is her sore ankle, and your new found love Are your seat cushions really soft in your boat? JK Hope she gets well soon And you too
Thanks Vin We will see if the fish are awake at 5 tomorrow morning. Hopefully there will be a few more boats out there in the morning. Helps to watch the locals to see where they are hittin the fish.
Paul, Paul, the sport is called fishing...........not catching.
If fish sleep, then the worms are
Well Paul if ya start hangin around with me I can take ya to my local fishing spots.BTW I know some good Dore spots in the Laprarie Basin.  MTP

Paul....you (wife) trying to match what my wife did in February....broke her right foot and was in a cast 8 weeks...and at the same time (1 week after breaking foot) had her gall bladder removed....she's still limping on it today.  Glad your bride is going better and thank God it's not broken...  Now GO CATCH SOME FISH....  Bob
At least you tried... now like others said, Go catch them! We are patient, we will wait.
breaking a foot on the day of the opener!!???  grounds for divorce!
